knimeNode.name: Aggregator
knimeNode.shortDescription: Node that aggregates the result for cross validation.

fullDescription.intro: This node is hard-wired to the outports of the cross validator. Connect it to the predictor node of your choice and select the target column (containing the row's "true" class label) and the prediction column in the dialog.

ports.dataIn: Contains the class column and the prediction column to compare.
ports.dataOut: A copy of the input table
